titleStmt.title: A copy of an account by Rāmānanda Bā̃ḍā of petitions he made to Rudravīra Sāha and Bam Sāha in justification of his claim to control the Luthāma Guṭhī [VS 1859]
Short title of document
E_2253_0015A
titleStmt.author: Badarībāṇa Sāhī]

msIdentifier.idno: Inventory number assigned by holding institution

phsyDesc.p: For details see entry in database

origin.p: Issued in Date of origin of document from Place of origin of document

editorialDecl.p: The original document from which this e-text was formed is in the Devanāgarī script. The electronic text below contains the following parts: abstract, edition in Devanāgarī, English translation and optionally commentary.

The text as it appears in the original document is reproduced as faithfully as possible, including diacritic marks, such as the nukta (़); format features, such as line breaks; and graphical features, such as the middle dot (•) sporadically employed to mark word separation, or macrons and lines of various shapes, often used as placeholders or structuring elements. The editorial techniques applied introduce minimally invasive normalizations (by using orig and reg inchoice) and corrections (by using sic and corr inchoice). Words are separated by w, even if scriptura continua is used in the original documents. Furthermore, s is employed to indicate sentence like text units.

listChange.change: Automatically converted from docx to TEI-XML

div.ab: First inscription records donors Dhanajyoti and his wife Rukamanī of Subāhāḥ sponsoring the installation of an image of Lokeśvara on a phalcā and setting up a guṭhī to observe its anniversary.
Second inscription records donors Dhanajyoti and his wife Rukamanī of Subāhāḥ sponsoring the installation of an image of Lokeśvara on a phalcā and setting up a guṭhī to observe its anniversary.

div.p: श्रीमालीका
(1) An empty line break follows me
( 2)Two line breaks without a break follows me.
(3) Text with 5 illegible characters
नमो रत्नंत्रयाय [रत्न˚] #+++++# ।। धर्म्मेश्वर: सकलपापविनाशहे-
(4) Text with a personal name
तुः सौखावतीगतिमहाज#pen{शुक्रवासरे शुक्रवासरे}#नमार्थहे[तुः] दुःखाधिपारगमनो
(5) Text with a place name
त्तमकर्ण्णधारः श्रीलोकनाथचरणं #pln{place_with_unique_id}#भवतो भजेहं ।। ।। श्रेयोऽस्तु
(6) Text with a geographical name
सम्वत्‌ ८२० वैशाषशुक्लचतुर्थ्या: परे #gen{corresp_ID}#पञ्चम्यान्तिथौ मृगशिर-
(7) All the lines with an ending - has attribute break <lb break="no"/>
नक्षत्रे अतिगण्डयोगे शुक्रवासरे थ्वकुन्हु श्रीलोकेश्वर फले प्र-
(8) This line includes a .
तिष्ठा दिन जुरो ।। ।। . दानपति सलको थविर श्री धनजोतिजु
(9) This line includes a gap of 5 lost lines with default extent type characters
नकर वम्हन प #////@lines# नकम थ्वया
(10) This line includes a gap of 5 illegible lines with default extent type characters
नकर वम्हन प #++++@lines# नकम थ्वया
(11) This line includes an addition to the text. default is : hand=first , place = above the line.
नकर वम्हन प #&@second{}# नकम थ्वया
(12) Some unclear text inside a text block default cert=high
तिष्ठा दिन जुरो ।। ।। #?{शुभमस्तु }# दानपति सलको थविर श्री धनजोतिजु
(13) sic: reproduced text with corrections
सहस्र पुण्य राक जुरो । शुभमस्तु सर्वदा ।तिष्ठा दिन जुरो ।। ।। #cor{¯¯¯¯}{- - -}# दानपति सलको थविर श्री धनजोतिजु
(13): orig: this line contains a text marked as original , rather than being normalized.
सहस्र पुण्य राक जुरो । शुभमस्तु सर्वदा ।तिष्ठा दिन जुरो ।। ।। #orig{सर्वदा}# दानपति सलको
(14): reg: this line contains a text marked as being normalized/corrected
सहस्र पुण्य राक जुरो । शुभमस्तु सर्वदा ।तिष्ठा दिन जुरो ।। ।। #reg{सर्वदा}{सर्वदा}# दानपति सलको
(15): This line contains unnecessary , repeated text
सहस्र पुण्य राक जुरो । शुभमस्तु सर्वदा ।तिष्ठा दिन जुरो ।। ।। #sur{सर्वदा}# दानपति सलको x
(16): This line includes 4 spaces , default unit=chars
सहस्र पुण्य राक जुरो । शुभमस्तु सर्वदा ।तिष्ठा दिन जुरो ।। ।। #....# दानपति सलको
(17) This line includes text supplied by editor, default reason is lost
सहस्र पुण्य राक जुरो । शुभमस्तु सर्वदा ।तिष्ठा दिन जुरो ।। ।। #sup{दानपति सलको }# दानपति सलको
